amendment.description: Amendment increases from 5 years to 7 years the period to participate in the Small Business Health Information Technology Financing Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 111-317 to increase from 5 years to 7 years the period to participate in the Small Business Health Information Technology Financing Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
